```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE
)

options(knitr.table.format = "latex",
        knitr.kable.NA = '')
```

```{r }
kable(chiefs_report, booktabs = TRUE, longtable = TRUE, align = c('l', 'l', rep('r', 10))) %>%
  row_spec(nrow(chiefs_report) - 1,  hline_after = TRUE) %>%
  row_spec(nrow(chiefs_report), bold = TRUE) %>%
  column_spec(2, "20em") %>%
  column_spec(4:13, "5.1em") %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("repeat_header"), font_size = 8) %>%
  collapse_rows(1:2, row_group_label_position = 'stack',
              latex_hline = "none", headers_to_remove = 1:2)

```
